column4: The student is participating in and served by a Reading/Language Arts program under Title I, Part A of ESEA as amended.
The student is participating in and served by a Mathematics program under Title I, Part A of ESEA as amended.
The student is participating in and served by a Science program under Title I, Part A of ESEA as amended.
The student is participating in and served by a Social Sciences program under Title I, Part A of ESEA as amended.
The student is participating in and served by a Career and Technical Education program under Title I, Part A of ESEA as amended.
The student is participating in and served by a program under Title I, Part A of ESEA as amended in a subject/category not yet defined in CEDS.
